website_summaries.verdict: Securely wear your phone and ID cards around your neck without compromising on comfort.
pros: Durable rubber material is strong and provides a quality grip
Lanyard can stretch to fit most smartphones
Lanyard includes added slot for ID or credit cards
Material is comfortable around the neck
Easily detach phone with secure clip
cons: May obstruct view of center placed cameras

customer_reviews.title: I suppose it is a good thing they sell these in packs of 3 because ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and did not realize I was purchasing a pack of 3. I suppose it is a good thing they sell these in packs of 3 because the bottom strap split the first time I put it on to my iPhone 6.Most definitely a waste of money and I have reached out twice with no follow up.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This really works to hold your phone. I have tried many devices and this is the only one that truly works. Hint: place the phone "upside down" in the straps so when you look down you can read the words. That way when a call or message comes in you pick it up and can read instantly. I love this. I highly recommend. Order received on time and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace my work lanyard so I could carry my phone and badge hands free. I'm a girl = no big pockets. ;) I've received a few compliments and purchase inquiries plus it's comfortable around my neck. As an added bonus, it swings and taps my belly when I walk so I'm constantly reminded to SUCK IT IN. They should market it that way. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Amazon

customer_reviews.title: it's exactly like the one I got from work EXCEPT it didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these for work from my job and it snapped in my first week and then they ran out. I found this one on Amazon, it's exactly like the one I got from work EXCEPT it didn't break. I've been using it daily while working as a personal shopper and it's been holding strong. The card is easy to get in and out quickly and the lanyard is stretchy and fits over any size phone case.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Alexander

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN iPhone
customer_reviews.text: NO, No, No, not designed for anything but iPhone and phones with similar placement of camera. Yes, I know it says it may interfere, however, is also says for any phone of particular size. There is no reason on gods green earth to say this is okay for an android. Who wants to take it off every time they want to take a picture. Cant use the finger print reader without much finagling. Why not just say it is made for iPhones. Stupid, stupid, stupid
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Tattrie

customer_reviews.title: My Phone Is Secure!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to make sure my phone didn't fall out of my hands and off the balcony and this little strap was perfect. None of the product obscures access to any features of the phone and that was my concern with others i looked at. The ONLY change I'd make is to the neckstrap. Altho it's a sturdy, rounded piece of rubber, it's not as comfortable as other materials for around the neck. That being said, great price, it came next day and I'm no longer worried about dropping my phone. Oh, one more thing, I LOVE the follow up email from the company; to me that's good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: jodi

customer_reviews.title: Puts to much pressure on my buttons and touchscreen
customer_reviews.text: My phone is a OnePlus. I thought it would be nice to hang my phone on my neck for work. This strap looked simple and easy to use. But I found a major problem with this device. One, the elastic strap hits my ON button and either shut my phone off or does a restart. My touchscreen is not recessed, so the strap exposed over the screen will try to start application "Buttons". I really do not feel that such a strap needs to be fussed with constantly to behave with my smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gorecki

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody keeps asking me where I got it. It's made of a very sturdy rubber-like material. I have an iPhone 5s, which is small, and it fits Ok, but a bigger phone would fit more snug. I love that I don't have to worry about losing my phone or scrambling to find it when it rings. It's just SO convenient! The card holder in the back is so tight only two credit cards will fit, and they're not going to fall out. I haven't tried cash yet, but I imagine it would be just as secure. I highly recommend this for young teen-agers, older forgetful people, like myself, or just busy professionals. It's a time and life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept My Phone Secure!
customer_reviews.text: This worked SO well for me during my trip to Alaska when I wanted to take my phone on the Denali Zipline tour! It Held my iPhone 7 nice and snug. The lanyard didn't want to stay in the position I had wanted it to be in but it definitely allowed me to take pictures during the biplane without worrying of dropping it! I see myself using this for busy trips and adventures in the future to save on pocket space!
customer_reviews.author: @Edwordo

customer_reviews.title: Lanyard is ID card length, not cross body length
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because I didn't realize that the lanyard was so short. It hangs at mid-chest. I was looking at ones that were cross body and would hang to the hip. I purchased this one by mistake. NOTE: The lanyard however is a really soft silicone. I regret that they don't make a lanyard twice the length. After doing some more digging, I found that the same company does make one with a cross body lanyard, but it is not silicone. It hasn't arrived yet. I don't know if it will be as comfortable as the first one.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after about 30 days. Okay, Doesn’t slip, held my cards and IPhone
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy them 2-3 at a time. It’s my main source of holding my phone. If u have a larger phone it stretches the rubber further and thinner, and it’s gonna snap at some point. I liked that my cards never fell out of it . This one lasted about a month before snapping. I still put a regular case on it to protect it but with holding one ID and one visa card w/my iPhone 7, it made it about a month before one of the sides snapped . This one has lasted shorter than my other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it broke the first day I used it, I took it off and was putting it back on and one of the lines connecting to the base broke. I didn't think I had put it on any differently than the first time I put it on earlier today. Very disappointed and feel like I wasted my money :(
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Works great with a iPhone SE 2020 in a phone case
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone SE 2020, (same size as an iPhone 7 & 8) with a Speck case and this lanyard/holder fits perfectly and holds the phone snugly. This has solved the problem of wanting my phone quickly accessible while wearing something without pockets, or with unreliable slanted or shallow pockets or using "dangerous" back pockets of jeans to hold the phone. (Yes, I have ruined a cell phone when it fell out of my back pocket into a a toilet!). The bottom straps on the holder do block the shift and number keys and the backspace and return keys, but I just roll them aside, type and roll them back. It's a very small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: deejaytee

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, but maybe not for iPhone 11 Pro
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this phone holder lanyard! Given the current pandemic, I wanted something I could clean more easily, all while keeping my phone in a place where I don’t have to go in my pockets! Should always wash your hands before you touch your phone if you’re out anyway but still. Fits the iPhone 11 Pro well except that part of the wallet can cover a little bit of one of the lower camera lenses at times. It’s possible to finagle it so it’s not covered, but if you ever take your phone out of this you will have to do it over again. Soft and durable silicone material is easy on your neck too!
customer_reviews.author: phoenixwings213

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend for larger phones
customer_reviews.text: I love this lanyard but I keep going through them too quickly. The rubber breaks after just a couple months. After buying 3 I am going to look for something more durable that will last longer. I think the material is just not strong enough to hold the weight of an iphone plus size. I do like the pocket on the back for holding my license or credit card. I really want to give this 5 stars because it's really a good concept, it's just not made well.
customer_reviews.author: lippy68

customer_reviews.title: Really good buuutt...
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! I use these at work and they are so comfortable to wear, easy to add my phone to, and love the little pocket for credit card or badge. My only issue is they dont last long. I usually have them break on me in about 3 to 4 months. The thin silicone straps that hold the phone in place have broken on one side for me. Still a good product but just wished it lasted a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Check Camera Location Before Buying
customer_reviews.text: Actually a nice holder. Works wonderfully EXCEPT my camera phone is in the middle of my phone, not on the corner, so the holder blocks my camera, meaning I have to remove the phone from the holder to take pictures. Highly annoying. This is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. I can't speak to the long term durability of the product, but it appears sturdy. Like all stretchy rubber, even heavy duty stuff, I am sure it will eventually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neck strap is too bouncy for me
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 8. This fits my phone very securely. I also have one of those rings on my case and this fits tightly but works. I don’t know if it is because of the ring on my case, but I found that the edges of the band seem to hit all the side buttons (volume and Siri) the neck strap I don’t like because it is too bouncy when you walk. I’ve replaced it with a material lanyard and for me it’s more comfortable when walking
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: It's a phone lanyard. Just don't expect to use your phone as well.
customer_reviews.text: It's a phone lanyard. If your phone is naked it'll work I guess but it doesn't work with an Otterbox or a battery pack attached to your phone. It blocks a lot of the screen corners and you cant use a finger reader if it's on the back of your phone. It also doesn't fit well on the Pixel 2 XL. Cute concept, not for most people I'd imagine.
customer_reviews.author: Steven DuRoss

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. I hate to send this back -it was only $10, however it was $10 and I didn’t really get to use it before I realized it was ripped around the card holder area. Not only that but it didn’t really fit my iPhone 11 Pro. Can’t really use all the features on my phone because the card holder covers up camera. I had bought some simple ones like this and given them as gifts and really liked them. Not this brand but similar rubber phone holders. Sorry that the ones I ordered before from another company were not available. Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elders that lose their phones!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design with basically small bungee cords! Awesome. My dad is almost 90 years old and lost his phone recently. I was able, after numerous calls, to find it but, let's just solve the issue right? This is perfect for him. It also provides me with comfort in knowing that if he falls, his phone is right with him. Easy and quick to put the phone in the little bungee cords. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DIY-er

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit as well on iPhone 8+ as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: When I put the cover on, it seems to pull the rubber to just about the breaking point. Also, the rubber on the front of the screen stays very close to the corners, covering the "back" button my phone. That said, it's a great idea, and if it holds up (which I'm not sure it will) It's great for walking, shopping etc. I wanted it for the gym but I'm not sure I trust it to hold up when I'm working our on various machines.
customer_reviews.author: M. OConnell

customer_reviews.title: Hands free phone and camera use!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this item for myself before a vacation we took in fall of 2018. I took it with me on Antarctica vacation in January 2019. When you are bundled up like an Eskimo, it's quite handy to have a camera at your fingertips but also hands free. Nice;, too, not have to struggle through layers of pockets. My husband absconded with mine and several other passengers also asked about it. I bought this one for my husband when we got back home. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: MBock

customer_reviews.title: I didnt like this at all
customer_reviews.text: This item did not suit me whatsoever and I gave it to my sister who says it's amazing, so I guess one out of two isnt bad; I personally couldnt stand the feeling of a thick "rubber band" around my neck and getting my hair tangled up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer D Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Just wasn’t happy.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this product for my Apple iPhone SE 2020. My phone is set inside a Body Glove Tidal Body Glove waterproof case. This item might be great for someone who has their phone in a thinner case. Since the design of the silicone straps is set to secure on the four corners of the phone, one of the straps on the top left side continuously turns down the volume of the phone. Ok design. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: SD 619

customer_reviews.title: No frills phone “cradle” with adjustable lanyard
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It’s ideal when biking or walking or whenever your phone needs to be readily accessible without having to root around in a purse or pockets. The lanyard is easily adjustable, and the phone “cradle” allows one to securely carry a phone and ID or credit card (but not both). If the pocket/slot on the back could be a bit larger, then I could carry BOTH my ID & CC; otherwise, it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jayelle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone with me easily & comfortably.
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Comfortable to wear around my neck. Elasticized so if I catch it on something it gives a little bit & doesn't strangle me. Only complaint is it does block the corner buttons a bit. Not so much that you can't use them most of the time, but definitely have problems typing texts. I slide halfway out when texting. Don't text enough for it to be a deal breaker for me though. Get lots a compliments on how convenient it looks like it is.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Floater

customer_reviews.title: Great phone lanyard...great for people who constantly take photos with their phone
customer_reviews.text: Great lanyard for phone. Does what it says it does. I particularly like the slot on the back for holding cards. Lanyard was very handy while on vacation. Made taking pictures easy while on vacation as I did not have to constantly "fish" phone from my pocket. I was also able to keep my hotel room key in the card slot which was very convenient. The only downside is that the bottom and top straps partially cover the screen (can sometimes make typing inconvenient).
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorTechie430

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: Very basic design but it is very nice works on my iPhone 7 the phone fell out once on the road while I was riding my motorcycle but I was able to pick it up before a car was able to destroy it I hook it up to my Bluetooth attachment on my bike and I’m able to change my music selections through this item but now I keep it inside my jacket and pull it out when necessary but for basic every day life I believe it’s OK.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne_O

customer_reviews.title: This item is GREAT for going on a cruise
customer_reviews.text: This item is GREAT for going on a cruise! When it arrived I was worried my LG5 wouldn't fit but it stretched far enough for a perfect fit even with a case. I placed my phone in the holder upside down and simply held it up for taking pictures without ever removing it from the holder! The card slot on the back securely held my Sea Pass!! Phone always ready to snap pics while not always having to carry your phone in your hand! I have purchased a second one "just in case" my original one does break or wear out. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Holds phone securely, but the strap pulls your hair
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I worry that the rubber straps on the corners will eventually break because they're thin, but it's holding up well and it's been a couple of months. It's handy when I'm running errands and don't want to carry my purse. The only complaint is with the strap because it's all rubber, which pulls my hair at my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Rated 3-stars because most cellphone lanyards are 19". Though listed as 17"; lanyard ACTUALLY measures 16.5" AND would be better at a full 19". Clip is not (and should not be) included in lanyard length description. May update review after some use -- just received today (05-11-2020).
customer_reviews.author: Racene LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Gym worthy-esque
customer_reviews.text: Great so far for my workout... the straps do cover some physical buttons on the side of my S7. The straps also cover parts of my physical keyboard while I'm logging my gains. Nothing I can't get around, overall I'm happy. No longer reaching into my deep gym short pockets or dropping my phone on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: A MUST for Disney!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for Disney World!! I don't have to worry about setting my phone down somewhere if I get distracted. I can check the Disney Experience App a million times without digging my phone out of a sweaty pocket or back pack. The pocket on the back is perfect to hold Fast Passes!! I have an iPhone 6s, & it fits well. I would not recommend for wider model Samsung or iPhone Plus models. I think they'll be too big & could break the product.
customer_reviews.author: almiller

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good option to have when you don’t have pockets but need your phone easy access. Easy to insert phone. Works just fine with an iPhone 7 that has a otter box commuter case and pop socket on the back. Card slot is a great bonus as well. Plan on using it whilst traveling to take photos.
customer_reviews.author: N🍌

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for free hands while you walk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item specifically to take walking. My toddler and I go walks almost daily. This lanyard keeps my phone out of my hands so I can walk with her hands free. Most workout clothes lack pockets. I also attached a mail key or anything else we need to carry to be hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spracklen

customer_reviews.title: Too tight for iPhone 6 with Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one last year for a work iPhone 6 with Otterbox case. The rubber loop for the lanyard clip broke within 2 months so I clipped the lanyard between the bottom two straps and it held up for another 12 months. The fit was great and not too tight or loose. I just replaced it recently thinking I’d get the same fit. Nope. They switched to a harder rubber and the fit is way too tight. As soon as I strapped it to my work phone I could see the rubber turn white from the stress. We’ll see how long this lasts. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Momzilla

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I bought a cheap one on Facebook. Charged $19.99 & phone kept slipping out & falling. It was pink & they sent a terrible orange lanyard. This one has a thin strap around the neck & has a much better grip on my phone. Glad I didn’t let the negative comments affect me. Seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Bev Staiger

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke when i tried to put my phone in
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for vacations so i could take pictures without worrying that my phone would fall. I never used it since i never went on vacation. Recently, i tried to use this when i went running around the neighborhood but the strap broke when i tried to put my phone in. I just threw it away. Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric c

customer_reviews.title: Soft thin silicone strap; and, my phone wanted to overheat when this thing was on.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work well for the intended use, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: A. New

customer_reviews.title: Not for Galaxy S9+
customer_reviews.text: Is not Universal....need to take Galaxy S9+ from compatible listing. Straps that hold phone in cover camera/fingerprint accessible, and goes across the power button. Phone wants to constantly turn off/Restart. Other than that it's made of durable material. I will see if it works for my wife's IPhone, if not....will be returning. Amazon needs to test products before selling to make sure product does what manufacturer claims.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Smith

customer_reviews.title: It holds the phone but...
customer_reviews.text: Can't access the fingerprint reader while this is on your phone. I have a Blu phone and the reader is on the back just like almost all phones and you can't easily access it. I bought this to use as a Shipt shopper and this isn't convenient to use after all. Will return and find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Truther

customer_reviews.title: Too snug on the iPhone 6s Plus when in a case.
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat device and a handy way to carry my iphone 6s Plus when riding my horse. Unfortunately, I don't trust it with my big phone because the rubber material stretches and turns whitish as the stress points. My phone is in a case, but not a bulky case. I don't trust the lanyard to not snap. Other than that, it's a neat product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howes

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, though would work for many others depending on need
customer_reviews.text: I often leave my phone behind, so was hoping to wear it on my lanyard for work. While I could potentially use it for this reason, the corners of the screen of the iPhone 8 I have are unfortunately crossed by the rubber band needed to hold it on. As such, it does cover some of the are one needs to swipe not infrequently, thus not so practical for quick use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for motorcycle rides
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be able to take pictures when I ride on the back of the Harley. It's a good length and works well. I would just caution you to periodically check if any of the corner straps slide off. This happened a couple of times after using it for a long period of time. I'd still recommend it. So convenient having my camera right there.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for my phone. I use the blue tooth as i shop and by using the lanyard i can see who is calling quickly and a not have to dig phone out of my purse or pocket. Be aware that it will pull your hair as it is a silicone type of material.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Good lanyark for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The product itself should be 3 stars as I can't use it with my S10 plus. This lanyark will block the back and front camera. However, it is perfect for if you have iPhone or any phone with back camera on the side and front camera in the middle. Customer service is 5 stars as the seller is very any issue very seriously and do whatever they can to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: bennywang

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest product
customer_reviews.text: I am not big on this product although I bought several for gifts before really using it myself. A friend was wearing one and went on to say how great it was. Therefore, I ordered thinking it would work for me. It got caught in clothing and I found myself forever making sure my phone was still in place. I still have several sitting in an envelope. I would bother purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Krall

customer_reviews.title: great for keeping track of your phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for husband and one for me. I used one for the first few days on the trip but then just ended up putting my phone in my travel pants pocket since having it around my neck felt a bit heavy and warm. But.....I do love the idea of it and will definitely use this going forward on certain occasions when I don't want to bring a purse . My husband never used it though.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Not universal! Misleading description of product!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read all the reviews. This isnt universal. I have a note 8 and it barely fits. Feels like its pressing on my phone too much and on top of that, it presses on the side buttons of the phone. Wrong description on item and bad product!
customer_reviews.author: Ursula434343

customer_reviews.title: Super Handy on Vacation
customer_reviews.text: I wore this in Europe while on sightseeing tours and it was super handy to have my phone ready right when I wanted to snap a shot. I have an iPhone 6S and it fit well without worry of slipping out. It was nice to not have to dig for it in my purse and risk missing a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and use this strap to keep my iPhone handy as I roam the house. I have my phone paired with a Bluetooth earpiece and utilize the microphones on the phone for my conference calls. Been using this set up for a week and have had no complaints from my callers. I don't like that the straps need to be adjusted each time I placed the lanyard around my neck. My kids say I look goofy wearing it, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Brent A Myers

customer_reviews.title: Hang anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This thing is going to be great for when I am hanging in a tree deer hunting I always worry about dropping my phone however with this I can just hang it on a branch. The only negative I have is that one of the straps hits the power button on my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: jacob hatfield

customer_reviews.title: I lost my phone once taking my two kids for ...
customer_reviews.text: I lost my phone once taking my two kids for a walk in their stroller. Luckily a nicer person found the phone, called my Mom, and walked the phone back to my house. Now I put the phone in this, and I either wear it around my neck or loop it around the front part of stroller handle so I can't lose it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika S

customer_reviews.title: Mmm Hmm
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was made of tightly woven fabric, it's actually a strong rubber, all in all it's pretty nice, definitely good to go when you don't need your phone sliding out of your pockets unpredictably.
customer_reviews.author: oGeesKeeMasK

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed carrying case
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use. It slips over phone easily. However phone shouldn't have a case or popsocket. Didn't use it. It covered my camera lens.
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: I really like this lanyard
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lanyard. I noticed right away how silky smooth feeling the material is. Also it seems well constructed, yet allows you plenty of room to access all the buttons that you need to access, as well as the camera. The pocket in the back is great to hold extra credit cards that my little phone case can’t fit. I think it would work with many different
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette H.

customer_reviews.title: Beware they break!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 total. I like the idea i’m having hands-free ability to carry my phone. However after a couple months of use each one broke as you can see in my picture. The latest one I bought does not appear to fit my iPhone 7 Plus. I suppose realizing now after purchasing the same lanyards they keep breaking or don’t fit adequately that it’s probably not worth buying-try searching around for a different brand because as you can see other people have reported that their lanyards have broken too.
customer_reviews.author: CNS

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: I just received it but so far it is great! I am a new army mom and expect a call at any time. This is great keeping my phone handy. The rubber will pull your hair and I will be attaching it to another lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: This is the best lanyard!
customer_reviews.text: This was.a great purchase. My iPhone fits perfectly and frees up both hands when grocery shopping - my Wegmans offers scan and bag your own groceries as you go. It has a slot on the back for one credit card, so when you are finished shopping you have your card quickly available to scan at the register and go!
customer_reviews.author: LVG

customer_reviews.title: IT’S OK BUT.....
customer_reviews.text: THE RUBBER BANDS ON THE TOP CROSS OVER THE BOTTONS ON THE iPhone 11 Pro AND THATS A PROBLEM. YOU CAN MOVE THEM OUT OF THE WAY BUT THEY ARE A PAIN AS THEY CROSS OVER THE SCREENS WHEN YIOU HAVE TO USE THE SCREAN TO PRESS AN OPTION. IT’S NOT SO EASY TO STRETCH ON THE BANDS ALSO
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Boss

customer_reviews.title: SWEEEEEEEEETT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. When I take a break riding my bike and walk around a new town, I use this to keep my phone close and safe since I don't have pockets. It is secure, and it would be light around my neck but my 6PLUS is heavier... With all this said, it totally serves the purpose for which I bought it. Highly recommend. I also use it when I am at a concert so the phone is near my chest and not in my pocket, won't sit on my phone, etc....
customer_reviews.author: AngusRox

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this I use it for my phone at work. I have to scan items all day with my phone whole food shopping for people and I love it! I don’t have to keep placing the phone down places it’s great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marie

customer_reviews.title: Only one small issue but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept and having my phone securely with me; however, on the iPhone 10, the band covers the volume button that turns the ringer all the way down. That is my only dislike but it works overall for functionality and convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cost is great but it did not last long.
customer_reviews.text: The product works great when you need to have your hands free but it did not last and Pulled apart. That is not good when it’s hanging around your neck and it falls. Your iPhone screen breaks😞The cost is great but it did not last long. I got mine the end of January 2019 and it pulled apart May 2019 .
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Worked but don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. It worked for what I needed but has to stretch a great deal to get it put on phone. Makes it difficult to put on and off. Looks like the stretching weakened it the first time I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is rubber. So it's probably durable but having rubber around your neck all day sucks. And it pressed down on the on/off button the whole time. Keeps killing my battery. I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and I've used it consistently. It is very convenient, as I always have media playing on my phone. However, upon receipt it was clear that I had to be careful with it. Neither the two parallel connecting rubber holes, nor the single rubber hole, connected together by the metal clip, are reinforced with metal. It was bound to break - and, unfortunately, it did, as the rubber got caught on a table. It would not have broken had the rubber been reinforced. It seems like basic ingenuity to have the connectors reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: Rhys Russell

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR MOVING AROUND OTHER OBJECTS
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be an excellent product to wear around my neck as opposed to holding my phone all the time. At first, it was perfect. After using it for about 5 times, my screen got two little cracks that later spread. Now I have a long crack from one end to the other on my phone. I wore it in the grocery store. I also use a walker and it may have bumped into something. It moved around as I moved around. Therefore, this perfect idea didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: ROSA DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Holds Phone Securely
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the crosswise straps on the face of the phone interfere with finger motion during use. Also, takes careful placement to ensure rear camera is not blocked.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: No butt dial
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry phone on belt loop works great. I add hook instead of lanyard. Need so can take on and off loop to answer.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. Sessions

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a vacation where I was worried I might drop my phone over a bridge or cliff or similar while taking a photo and wanted to keep it safe! It fit my little SE just fine, even over a finger pop. One benefit I wasn't thinking about, but really appreciated, was that it made it very hard to pick pocket. I was in a city notorious for pick pockets, and, with my phone on this around my neck, I felt much more confident about it not getting stolen.
customer_reviews.author: KMNelson

customer_reviews.title: Maybe better for larger phones?
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this at first, good tifht fit (Gallaxy S5). However, with daily use it seems to have stretched out and phone slips out of it easily, such that I have found it on the ground several times and will no longer trust it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off Iphone
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget fits tight but the top rite corner strap presses against the off button and turns off the phone, even after repositioning, This is on a Iphone 7 plus so if you have a smaller phone it might be okay.
customer_reviews.author: hefe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this product. The lanyard is very rubbery and it makes the cell phone bounce up and down as you walk causing causing you to have to hold the phone in your hand! It defeats the purpose. The rubbing and pulling on your neck is very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Anne Koribanics

customer_reviews.title: legit product, worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: My previous landyard strap i used, i had to take it out of the case every time to take a photo. I wouldve gave this a 5 star but the landyard string that goes around my neck was rubber so my hair would get caught and yanked. Useful product if you go on vacation or go swimming (If your phone is water proof)
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: A co-worker recommended this and is still using her's. I bought it at the end of last school year, and after 2 weeks into the new school year, mine broke where it attaches to the hook, unusable. I don't have children and didn't misuse it in anyway. I was simply taking it off to show someone and it just broke. I'm super unhappy, because my friend is still using her's and I got the lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I mostly like it. The problem is with the bands that hold the phone in place; they get in the way of using the screen. But for transport and having my phone with me, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl P. Williams

customer_reviews.title: phone can sometimes slip out of holder when warm
customer_reviews.text: In general, the case worked well . The only problem I had was that sometimes when the case (without lanyard) was in a warm pocket ( e.g. vest or shirt) the phone would work its way loose from the case and fall out as I took it out by the metal latch.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating and my husband loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband back in June. It did get a small tear 5 months later, but honestly he used the heck out of it!!! He is an electrician, so he loves the hands-free aspect. He uses it daily and hard, so it has been completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Dont fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a samsung galaxy s9+ and it was a struggle to get it on my phone. It was pushing against my buttons and made my phone go into some weird reset mode. I dont like it.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It's is too small for my phone they should make for bigger phones and specific phones, I can stretched but looks like it will boost any minute due the big size of the phone
customer_reviews.author: EPS

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: This covers up the volume and power button on my iPhone you have to shimmy it on the iPhone 7plus I was using it for my Instacart card and the lanyard is way too short
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Rubber lanyard around neck and lack of hold on iphone
customer_reviews.text: Got this to make my phone easily accessible pn backpacking trip. Didn’t end up using it. Lanyard was rubber and super uncomfortable rubbing around neck and didn’t seem to have a very good hold of phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: This lanyard has been great for work
customer_reviews.text: This lanyard has been great for work, especially when I don't have pockets. I work at a school, and take my phone out on the yard for emergencies, and I don't have to worry about carrying it around or it falling. It carries my work badge, my whistle, and my phone. Awesome product! UPDATE: I stretched it too far and broke the part that holds my phone. I have had this for about 6 months and gotten quite a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Best cell phone holder
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!Handy!Easy to use! Great price. I have used it now, daily, for several weeks. It allows me to keep hands free from carrying it. Allows me to put it under my clothes while wearing if I don't want it visible. Never liked putting it in my pocket, especially, back pocket where it's easily taken or falls out. Will buy again if I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: KP Murry

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and get lots of compliments on it. It keeps my hands free so don't lose the phone, which is often my camera on a hike, so I can have my hands free. Tip: this product can come loose and the phone fall out. I use two black rubber bands to hold the lanyard on more securely and it blends to look like part of the lanyard. No one realizes it's not part of the lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly  Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not sure of durability but functions well
customer_reviews.text: It worked well but I wouldn't want to use it in a situation where the material would be taxed a lot....don't think it would take much to rip this. Worked well to carry camera on vacation though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren W

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone out of your pockets. Not for rugged use.
customer_reviews.text: Puts phone right where I want it. Easy to use phone, use speaker feature of your phone hands free (face phone upside down in holder). After some time the straps that secure the phone loosen up allowing the phone to fall out if you jar it. Straps stretch and can break. Would recommend replacing every 6 months or so.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Silva

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as durability is concerned. I use it on my kayak fishing when I have a few pieces of equipment that’s Bluetooth, gives me confidence I won’t drop in lake
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F Fields

customer_reviews.title: I found it so handy and much better than digging out my phone from purse or fanny ...
customer_reviews.text: While on a bus tour in Canada two people had this lanyard on for their phones. I found it so handy and much better than digging out my phone from purse or fanny pack . Loved the ease with which it is used and the security of having the phone held.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because it allows me to have my phone at my finger tips when I am working in my yard or taking my daily walk. Another thing I like is - the slot that you can carry your ID!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny A

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: When you need your phone but don't have a secure place to store it. Also makes it extremely accessible and you don't risk setting it down somewhere and forgetting it. Great for dog walking too!
customer_reviews.author: M. M. Enyart

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Venice so I wouldn’t drop my phone in a canal. Had to skip the trip due to a severe knee injury but this came in super handy to keep my phone with me hands-free while on my crutches!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lavy

customer_reviews.title: Best $10 purchase you can make for your phone!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase. I wear this around my neck when walking the dog, carrying groceries, etc...It has a place that perfectly fits my license and a few bills or debit card. EVerywhere I go people ask about it and take pictures of it so they can order one!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought it for my grandma as she is starting to go walking on a daily basis and needed something to hold her phone as she uses the phone to track your steps. Mind you she doesn't want a Fitbit so this is what she uses instead. Every day that I see her she thinks me over and over again for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Coll

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Supppeerr handy at work and anywhere else. I think the bottom part kind of bugs me when I'm trying to type or use my keyboard.. but i just take one of the straps off and it's OK :) I still love it though :)
customer_reviews.author: Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Works but note for iPhone 7 users
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job. Would be 5 star except where straps go around corners, this blocks my finger from hitting iPhone 7 commands at those locations. I'd like to shorten the length then maybe it wouldn't swing as much? For price, it's doing it's job I don't have to keep looking for my dang phone.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: This is an interesting phone holder. I saw someone have one and I had to try it. It’s nice because now my phone is not falling out of my pockets. Looking forward to using it in the garden and outside with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have a new phone
customer_reviews.text: These work great. A little short to shoot photos with but you just have to stretch them a bit. The only downside is if you have a phone that's camera is in the middle it blocks it. It must be a phone with the camera on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaica Bergstrom

product_meta.title: Gear Beast Universal Cell Phone Lanyard Compatible with iPhone, Galaxy & Most Smartphones Includes Phone Case Holder with Card Pocket, Silicone Neck Strap
feature_bullets: Universal Smartphone Lanyard Strap keeps your phone secure and accessible at all times. The perfect solution for sports fans, concert goers, teachers, students, hikers, seniors, travelers or anyone who wants easy access to their cell phone.

17 inch Silicone neck strap is comfortable to wear while extra strong lightweight silicone phone holder provides a secure carrying solution to prevent drops. Large SWIVEL CLIP can hold keys or name badge.
CONVENIENT CARD SLOT AND ID HOLDER holds Credit Card, License, Access Card or Cash.

COMPATIBLE WITH MOST PHONES, with or without a phone case, including iPhone 11, 11 Pro, 11 Pro Max, X, Xs, Xs Max, Xr, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7,6 Plus, 6, Galaxy S10, S10e, S10 Plus (S10+), S9, S9 Plus, S8, S8 Plus, Galaxy Note 10, 10 Plus (10+), 9 and 8. The phone holder may partially block the rear camera lenses on some phones. It may be necessary to adjust the holder to use the camera.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars1,688 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
